articles.title: Coronavirus vaccine: Oxford's COVID-19 vaccine safe for people with weak immunity - Times Now
articles.description: The vaccine being used in trials in Brazil, that involves 5,000 volunteers is similar to the one used in the UK and South Africa. This vaccine is based on an adenovirus.
articles.content:
• Oxford's COVID-19 vaccine is one of the most promising jab candidates against the novel coronavirus infection
  • The vaccine is currently being tested in Brazil
